subject: Fwd: Ortho Lunch
user_instruction: Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical therapists.  We identified that she does share her patients with us but we need to work on our Epic integration.  Could you log an Md-to-MD activity with Dr. McDonald and capture the notes from the thread?
content:
User Request:
Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical therapists.  We identified that she does share her patients with us but we need to work on our Epic integration.  Could you log an Md-to-MD activity with Dr. McDonald and capture the notes from the thread?

Email Thread:
---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Blake Thomson < blakethomson8@gmail.com > Date: Fri, Jul 25, 2025 at 2:22 PM Subject: Re: Ortho Lunch To: Devon McDonald < dvnmcdonald@gmail.com > Hi Devon,  Thanks for taking the time to meet with us! I wanted to follow up on a couple of items from the meeting:  - We understand that there are challenges with the Epic integration. I will take this back to our team and see what we can do.  - We appreciate you sharing your patients with Dr. Uquillis ! We value the relationship and ability to serve our patients - I will follow up with you in 60-days to re-assess if there are any changes on your end.  Thanks so much !  Blake On Fri, Jul 25, 2025 at 2:20 PM Devon McDonald < dvnmcdonald@gmail.com > wrote: Hi Blake,  Yes, I am still available for Lunch. Looking forward to the discussion.  Devon On Fri, Jul 25, 2025 at 2:20 PM Blake Thomson < blakethomson8@gmail.com > wrote: Hi Devon,  I wanted to follow up on behalf of Cedars and Dr. Uquillis and see if you are still available for lunch on Friday, July 25th?  Thanks !  
 -- Devon McDonald   | Video Editor   |  Red Iron NYC  |  212-675-2828 devon@redironnyc.com   |  www.redironnyc.com/ 18 West 21st St., 11th fl  | New York, NY 10010
